summary: Completed comprehensive testing of deleted messages recovery feature with backend APIs fully functional and frontend chat interface accessible

ui_bugs.issue: Click action blocked by 'Made with Emergent' overlay badge
ui_bugs.workaround: Use force=True in click action or adjust z-index of overlay

passed_tests: GET /api/chat/my-deleted-messages/{userId} - Fetch user's deleted messages (Found 2 deleted messages)
GET /api/chat/trash/requests - Admin get restore requests (Found 1 restore request)
GET /api/chat/trash - Admin get all deleted messages (Found 13 deleted messages)
Message restoration verification (restored message found in conversation)

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (Chat interface loads, login works, minor overlay issue with FAB button)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix FAB button overlay issue - the 'Made with Emergent' badge is intercepting click events on the Plus/New button. Adjust z-index or positioning to ensure proper interaction with the deleted messages functionality.
